name: Ancient Dust
summary: You cough up a cloud of gray soil.

name: Approximate
summary: Magically estimate the number of nearby objects.

name: Boost Eidolon
summary: You focus deeply on the link between you and your eidolon and boost the power of your eidolon's attacks.

name: Bullhorn
summary: Magnify your voice to be heard at a distance.

name: Buzzing Bites
summary: You evoke buzzing and crawling insects to climb onto a foe's body and bite.

name: Caustic Blast
summary: Fling a glob of acid that splashes a small area.

name: Clinging Ice
trait: Cantrip, Cold, Hex, Manipulate, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Freezing sleet and heavy snowfall collect on the target's feet and legs, dealing 1d4 cold damage and other effects depending on its Reflex save.

name: Courageous Anthem
trait: Bard, Cantrip, Composition, Concentrate, Emotion, Mental, Uncommon
summary: You inspire yourself and your allies with words or tunes of encouragement.

name: Daze
summary: Cloud a creature's mind and possibly stun it.

name: Deep Breath
summary: Take an incredibly deep breath.

name: Detect Magic
summary: Sense whether magic is nearby.

name: Detect Metal
summary: Sense whether metal is nearby.

name: Discern Secrets
summary: Your patron deigns to whisper a few secrets.

name: Distortion Lens
summary: You create a magical lens that distorts space as best suits you.

name: Divine Lance
trait: Attack, Cantrip, Concentrate, Manipulate, Sanctified, Spirit
summary: Throw divine energy that deals spirit damage.

name: Draw Moisture
summary: Dry out an object and collect the water.

name: Eat Fire
trigger: You would take fire damage.
duration: until the end of your next turn
summary: React to eat flame then belch the smoke out.

name: Electric Arc
summary: Zap one or two creatures with lightning.

name: Elemental Counter
trigger: You or a creature within 60 feet rolls a saving throw against a spell with the earth, fire, metal, plant, water, or wood trait, or are targeted by a spell attack with such a trait.
requirement: You have a spell slot from which you could Cast a Spell of the triggering spell's countering element; see text.
summary: Use a countering element to protect against a spell.

name: Evil Eye
trait: Cantrip, Curse, Hex, Manipulate, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Your patron's resentment manifests in a baleful, envious gaze.

name: Figment
summary: Create a simple auditory or visual illusion.

name: Forbidden Thought
summary: You place a psychic lock in a foe's mind that prevents it from a specific action.

name: Forbidding Ward
summary: Protect an ally against one specific enemy.

name: Frost's Touch
summary: Your _gelid shard_ drinks down nearby heat in a futile attempt to sate itself and achieve a level of frigid cold unheard of on the Material Plane.

name: Frostbite
summary: Damage a creature with bitter cold.

name: Gale Blast
summary: Damage and push adjacent creatures with air.

name: Glass Shield
duration: until the start of your next turn
summary: Protect yourself with a glass shield.

name: Glimpse Weakness
summary: You glimpse a loose scale, a seam in a foe's armor, or a similar weakness, aiding your allies in landing a precise hit.

name: Gouging Claw
summary: Morph your limb into a claw and attack with it.

name: Guidance
duration: until the start of your next turn
summary: Divine guidance improves one roll.

name: Haunting Hymn
summary: A powerful hymn harms and deafens.

name: Healing Plaster
target: a handful of dirt or mud
summary: Transform mud into a healing plaster to treat wounds without healer's tools.

name: Ignition
summary: Burn a creature up close or at range.

name: Illuminate
summary: Kindle all light sources around you.

name: Imaginary Weapon
trait: Attack, Cantrip, Evocation, Force, Psychic, Uncommon
summary: You create a simple weapon of force.

name: Infectious Enthusiasm
summary: Encourage yourself and an ally to improve one roll apiece.

name: Inside Ropes
summary: You pull a large handful of guts from your midsection.

name: Invoke True Name
target: 1 creature whose true name you know
summary: You speak the true name of a creature to more surely affect it with your magic.

name: Join Pasts
summary: Share thoughts and experiences with allies.

name: Know the Way
summary: Learn true north and the direction to another location.

name: Light
summary: Make an object glow.

name: Live Wire
trait: Attack, Cantrip, Concentrate, Electricity, Manipulate, Metal
summary: Slash and shock a creature with an electrified filament.

name: Message
trait: Auditory, Cantrip, Concentrate, Illusion, Linguistic, Mental, Subtle
summary: Speak a message to a distant creature, who can reply.

name: Murmuration
trait: Cantrip, Concentrate, Hex, Sonic, Uncommon, Witch
summary: The target feels the brush of feathers against its skin and hears screeches in its ears, warning it to keep away from a creature you designate.

name: Musical Accompaniment
summary: You're surrounded by orchestral music that shifts and changes to match your behavior.

name: Needle Darts
summary: Turn a piece of metal into needles and shoot them at a foe.

name: Nudge Fate
summary: The barest spin of your patron's spool is enough to alter fate.

name: Pact Broker
trait: Cantrip, Enchantment, Hex, Mental, Rare, Witch
summary: You offer to broker a pact of peace.

name: Phase Bolt
summary: Fire a spike of magic that can pass through shields and cover

name: Prestidigitation
summary: Perform a minor magical trick.

name: Protect Companion
target: your eidolon, or a creature with the minion trait under your control
duration: until the start of your next turn
summary: Shield your eidolon or minion from harm.

name: Puff of Poison
summary: Exhale toxins to poison a foe.

name: Read Aura
summary: Detect if an object is magical.

name: Read the Air
summary: Pick up societal cues.

name: Reinforce Eidolon
summary: You focus deeply on the link between you and your eidolon and reinforce your eidolon's defenses.

name: Root Reading
summary: Learn about an area using root systems.

name: Rousing Splash
summary: Splash a creature to invigorate it and wash away acid and fire.

name: Scatter Scree
summary: Evoke rocks to bludgeon and create difficult terrain.

name: Scrounger's Glee
trait: Auditory, Cantrip, Concentrate, Fear, Hex, Mental, Uncommon, Witch
summary: With a cruel laugh and a flash of your canines, you make a target understand that death is coming to claim it and that its demise will serve to strengthen another.

name: Shield
duration: until the start of your next turn
summary: A shield of magical force blocks attacks and spells.

name: Shroud of Night
trait: Cantrip, Darkness, Hex, Manipulate, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Your patron blankets the target's eyes in darkness.

name: Sigil
summary: Leave a magical mark.

name: Silver's Refrain
summary: Make weapons silver and impede a devil's teleportation.

name: Slashing Gust
requirement: You have at least one free hand.
summary: Cut creatures with ripples of air.

name: Song of Strength
trait: Bard, Cantrip, Composition, Concentrate, Emotion, Mental, Uncommon
summary: You bolster your allies' physical strength with a hearty exhortation.

name: Spirit Object
summary: Using a sliver of Baba Yaga's power, you briefly bring an object to life.

name: Spout
summary: Batter creatures with a water blast.

name: Stabilize
summary: Stabilize a dying creature.

name: Sting of the Sea
summary: A long tentacle like that belonging to an octopus, anemone, or man-of-war, dripping with briny water, appears from a glowing blue portal to wrap around the targets face, blocking its vision.

name: Stoke the Heart
trait: Cantrip, Concentrate, Emotion, Hex, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Your patron fills a creature with fervor, empowering their blows.

name: Summon Instrument
summary: Call an instrument that only you can play.

name: Take Root
summary: Reinforce a creatures stance or grip with roots.

name: Tame
summary: Make a domesticated animal friendlier to you.

name: Tangle Vine
trait: Attack, Cantrip, Concentrate, Manipulate, Plant, Wood
summary: Conjure a vine to entangle a creature.

name: Telekinetic Hand
target: 1 unattended object of Light bulk or less
summary: Move an object with a floating hand.

name: Telekinetic Projectile
summary: Fling an object at a creature.

name: Telekinetic Rend
summary: Your mind creates a violent axis of motion in a nearby space.

name: Thermal Stasis
duration: until the start of your next turn
summary: The same abilities that let you raise or lower thermal energy also let you keep it at a safe medium.

name: Timber
summary: Drop a tree on someone.

name: Time Sense
summary: Know perfectly what time it is

name: Torturous Trauma
summary: You batter a creature's internal organs, leaving no external signs of the immense pain you delivered.

name: Tremor Signs
summary: Send a sentence through stone.

name: Uplifting Overture
trait: Bard, Cantrip, Composition, Concentrate, Emotion, Mental, Uncommon
summary: Your performance makes allies feel they can succeed at anything.

name: Vitality Lash
target: 1 creature that is undead or otherwise has void healing
summary: Damage and weaken the undead with vital energy.

name: Void Warp
summary: Damage and weaken the living with void energy.

name: Warp Step
summary: Contract space to cover more ground when you move

name: Wash Your Luck
summary: Ignore misfortune once.

name: Wilding Word
summary: Your patron's majestyor their displeasurecomes in a growl from your throat, making other creatures reluctant to harm you.

name: Rallying Anthem
trait: Bard, Cantrip, Composition, Concentrate, Emotion, Mental, Uncommon
summary: Your song moves allies to protect themselves more effectively.

name: Triple Time
trait: Bard, Cantrip, Composition, Emotion, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon
summary: Your music sets a fast pace.

name: Astral Rain
summary: You fling a mass of furious thoughts into the air, where they expand into numerous blades or other shapes that rain down.

name: Dirge of Doom
trait: Bard, Cantrip, Composition, Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Mental, Uncommon
summary: Enemies within the area are frightened 1.

name: Entropic Wheel
trait: Cantrip, Cold, Evocation, Fire, Psychic, Uncommon
trigger: You deal cold or fire damage to an enemy
summary: You stockpile thermal energy in a magical wheel-like construct that lets you burn opponents with cold or freeze their bodies with heat.

name: Ghostly Shift
summary: Your body becomes insubstantial as you partially phase out.

name: Omnidirectional Scan
duration: until the start of your next turn
summary: You quickly view your surroundings from a variety of angles, your senses constructing an overall mental picture.

name: Shatter Mind
summary: You telepathically assail the minds of your foes.

name: Song of Marching
trait: Bard, Cantrip, Composition, Concentrate, Mental, Uncommon
summary: You maintain a brisk performance that keeps allies on the move.

name: Vector Screen
duration: until the start of your next turn
summary: You set up a transparent, rippling screen of telekinetic energy that seizes small, fast-moving projectiles.

name: Contagious Idea
trait: Cantrip, Emotion, Enchantment, Mental, Psychic, Uncommon
target: 1 or 2 creatures other than yourself (see text)
summary: Nothing is so contagious as a thought.

name: Dancing Blade
summary: You telekinetically animate a weapon that's unattended or on your person.

name: Foresee the Path
summary: You see just a split second into the future and glean how an enemy will move, making it easier for your allies to strike it mid-action.

name: Hologram Cage
summary: You weave light into a cube of vivid and fantastic patterns.

name: House of Imaginary Walls
trait: Bard, Cantrip, Composition, Illusion, Manipulate, Uncommon, Visual
summary: You mime an invisible 10-foot-by-10-foot wall adjacent to you and within your reach.

name: Redistribute Potential
trait: Cantrip, Cold, Evocation, Fire, Psychic, Uncommon
summary: Energy attempts to balance out, but with your magic, you can shunt all the energy in one area to another.

name: Tesseract Tunnel
summary: You race from point to point, tearing open a tunnel in space.

name: Allegro
trait: Bard, Cantrip, Composition, Concentrate, Emotion, Mental, Uncommon
summary: You perform rapidly, speeding up your ally.

name: Adapt Self
summary: You make subtle changes to yourself to adapt to the situation.

name: Agile Feet
duration: until the end of the current turn
summary: The blessings of your god make your feet faster and your movements more fluid.

name: Ancestral Memories
summary: The memories of long-dead spellcasters grant you their knowledge, making your spells more formidable.

name: Ancestral Touch
trait: Emotion, Fear, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Oracle, Uncommon
summary: You touch a creature and force them to see and feel the ancestors surrounding you.

name: Angelic Halo
trait: Aura, Concentrate, Focus, Holy, Sorcerer, Uncommon
summary: You gain an angelic halo with an aura that increases allies' healing from the _heal_ spell.

name: Appearance of Wealth
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Illusion, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: You create a brief vision of immense wealth filling the spell's area.

name: Arms of Nature
trait: Concentrate, Druid, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon, Wood
target: 1 wooden object or plant of at least 4 Bulk
summary: All wood, dead or alive, is your armory.

name: Ashen Wind
source: Pathfinder #185: A Taste of Ashes pg. 81
summary: You conjure a swirling wind of ashes that blows through the area.

name: Athletic Rush
summary: Your body fills with physical power and skill.

name: Bit of Luck
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Fortune, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: You tilt the scales of luck slightly to protect a creature from disaster.

name: Blood Ward
summary: Your patron's aegis descends to shield a target from harm.

name: Brain Drain
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Oracle, Uncommon
summary: You probe the target's mind to glean knowledge.

name: Cackle
summary: With a quick burst of laughter, you prolong a magical effect you created.

name: Call to Arms
trait: Auditory, Cursebound, Emotion, Enchantment, Mental, Oracle, Uncommon, Focus
trigger: You are about to roll for initiative.
summary: You cry out a call to arms, inspiring your allies to enter the fray.

name: Charged Javelin
summary: You fire a javelin of electricity that leaves a charged field around its target.

name: Charming Push
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Incapacitation, Mental, Uncommon, Wizard
duration: until the start of your next turn
summary: You push at the target's mind to deflect their ire.

name: Charming Touch
trait: Cleric, Emotion, Focus, Incapacitation, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon
target: 1 creature that could find you attractive
summary: You infuse your target with attraction, causing it to act friendlier toward you.

name: Cinder Gaze
summary: You've learned to read the future in the patterns of flames and smoke.

name: Cloak of Shadow
trait: Aura, Cleric, Darkness, Focus, Manipulate, Shadow, Uncommon
summary: You drape the target in a mantle of swirling shadows that make it harder to see.

name: Cornucopia
trait: Concentrate, Druid, Focus, Healing, Manipulate, Plant, Uncommon, Vitality
summary: Vines twine into a wicker horn in your hands, and out spills a single fruit, nut, or similar small bit of produce.

name: Counter Performance
trait: Bard, Composition, Concentrate, Focus, Fortune, Mental, Uncommon
trigger: You or an ally within 60 feet rolls a saving throw against an auditory or visual effect
summary: Your performance protects you and your allies.

name: Creative Splash
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Illusion, Manipulate, Uncommon, Visual
summary: A deluge of paint or colorful illusions descend on the area, reflecting your personal creative specialty.

name: Crushing Ground
trait: Concentrate, Druid, Earth, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
source: Rage of Elements pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup>, Secrets of Magic pg. 200 <sup>1.1</sup>
summary: You tear open the ground then slam it shut.

name: Cry of Destruction
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Sonic, Uncommon
summary: Your voice booms, smashing what's in front of you.

name: Dazzling Flash
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Light, Manipulate, Uncommon, Visual
summary: You raise your religious symbol and create a blinding flash of light.

name: Death's Call
trigger: A living creature within 20 feet of you dies, or an undead creature within 20 feet of you is destroyed
summary: Seeing another pass from this world invigorates you.

name: Delay Consequence
trigger: A creature or object within range is hit by an attack.
summary: You transpose the moment that the target would be injured to later in its timestream.

name: Diabolic Edict
summary: You issue a diabolic edict, demanding the target perform a particular task and offering rewards for its fulfillment.

name: Dim the Light
trigger: You cast a darkness or shadow spell.
summary: You magnify the darkness from the triggering effect, causing the ambient light level to flicker briefly so you can slip from sight.

name: Dimensional Assault
summary: You tumble through space, making a short dimensional hop to better position yourself for an attack.

name: Distracting Decoy
summary: You conjure a colorful, fast-moving shape, such as a small bird or other animal that draws your targets eye.

name: Divine Plagues
summary: Your deity sends wracking plagues.

name: Diviner's Sight
trait: Concentrate, Divination, Fortune, Uncommon, Wizard, Focus
duration: until the end of your next turn
summary: You glimpse into the targets future.

name: Draconic Barrage
summary: You shape energy into one incorporeal tiny dragon that flits around you.

name: Dragon Claws
summary: Vicious claws grow from your fingers.

name: Earthworks
trait: Concentrate, Earth, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon, Wizard
summary: With a ripple of earth, you raise small barriers from the ground.

name: Efficient Apport
target: 1 unattended object of light Bulk or less
summary: Walking over to an item to pick it up is so much effort.

name: Eject Soul
target: 1 living creature that has a soul
summary: Your touch disrupts the connection between body and soul, possibly forcing the soul out of the body altogether.

name: Elemental Betrayal
summary: Your patron uses its superior command of the elements, empowering them to undermine your foe.

name: Elemental Toss
summary: With a flick of your wrist, you fling a chunk of your elemental matter at your foe.

name: Empty Inside
summary: You inject a sliver of the void into your mind, momentarily remaking it into a bleak and empty place.

name: Evolution Surge
summary: You flood your eidolon with power, creating a temporary evolution in your eidolon's capabilities.

name: Extend Boost
summary: You focus on the intricacies of the magic binding you to your eidolon to extend the duration of your _boost eidolon_ or _reinforce eidolon_ spell.

name: Face in the Crowd
summary: While in a crowd of roughly similar creatures, your appearance becomes bland and nondescript.

name: Faerie Dust
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Sorcerer, Uncommon
summary: You sprinkle magical dust in the spell's area, making those within easier to trick.

name: Fire Ray
trait: Attack, Cleric, Concentrate, Fire, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
duration: until the end of the target's next turn
summary: A blazing band of fire arcs through the air, lighting your opponent and the ground they stand upon on fire.

name: Flurry of Claws
trait: Attack, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Sorcerer, Uncommon
target: 2 creatures no more than 10 feet from each other
summary: Vicious dragon claws appear and slash at two nearby foes.

name: Force Bolt
summary: You fire an arrow-shaped bolt of force, one of the most common and reliable forms of battle magic.

name: Force Fang
summary: You briefly turn your attack into pure force to bypass your opponent's defenses.

name: Fortify Summoning
summary: As you call a creature to your side, your magic transforms its body, heightening its ferocity and fortifying its resilience.

name: Frenzied Revelry
trait: Cleric, Emotion, Enchantment, Mental, Rare, Focus
target: you and allies in the area
summary: You recall memories of hedonistic rites to send yourself into an infectious frenzy, dancing and howling wildly to encourage your companions to join in.

name: Genie's Veil
trigger: A creature within range is attacked.
summary: With a flourish, you fulfill a creature's wish for protection, bending reality to keep them from harm.

name: Glutton's Jaws
trait: Attack, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Sorcerer, Uncommon
summary: A slavering maw opens beneath a target and tries to take a bite out of them.

name: Gravity Weapon
summary: You build up gravitational force and funnel it into your blows, leading to more powerful attacks with blade and bow alike.

name: Guided Introspection
summary: You guide the target in examining their innermost feelings, their behaviors, and the motivations behind their actions, granting them clarity and insight.

name: Hallowed Ground
summary: One small space becomes inhospitable to undead as you fill it with life-infused benevolent magic.

name: Hand of the Apprentice
summary: You take advantage of one of the most fundamental lessons of magic to levitate and propel your weapon.

name: Heal Animal
trait: Druid, Focus, Healing, Manipulate, Uncommon, Vitality
summary: You heal an animal's wounds, restoring 1d8 Hit Points to the target.

name: Heal Companion
summary: You heal your animal companion's wounds.

name: Healer's Blessing
summary: Your words bless a creature with an enhanced connection to vital energy.

name: Hollow Heart
trait: Cleric, Emotion, Enchantment, Fear, Mental, Rare, Focus
summary: You stoke the target's ambition beyond reason, until it believes no one is capable of helping it, or that others aren't to be trusted.

name: Hurtling Stone
trait: Attack, Cleric, Earth, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: You evoke a magical stone and throw it, with divine guide to your aim.

name: Hymn of Healing
trait: Bard, Composition, Concentrate, Focus, Healing, Uncommon, Vitality
summary: Your glorious singing mends wounds and provides a temporary respite from harm.

name: Hyperfocus
summary: You sharpen a creatures senses, though more distant objects become hazy, indistinct, or muted to it.

name: Ignite Ambition
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Emotion, Focus, Mental, Subtle, Uncommon
trigger: You or an ally in range attempt to use a mental effect to convince a creature to do something (such as a Coerce, Request, or a suggestion spell)
summary: You strengthen the target's ambition, increase its resentment of its allies, and make its allegiances more susceptible to change.

name: Incendiary Aura
trait: Concentrate, Fire, Focus, Manipulate, Oracle, Uncommon
summary: You surround yourself with a combustible aura.

name: Inner Upheaval
summary: You focus your qi into devastating magical attacks.

name: Jealous Hex
summary: You draw forth a hag's innate jealousy to deny a target its greatest attribute.

name: Keen Smell
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Morph, Ranger, Uncommon
summary: Your nose becomes more sensitive to the scents of the wild, the better for you to track your quarry.

name: Lament
summary: You let out your negative emotions in a guttural wail that shakes your enemies hearts.

name: Lay on Hands
trait: Champion, Focus, Healing, Manipulate, Uncommon, Vitality
target: 1 willing living creature or 1 undead creature
summary: Your hands become infused with powerful vitality, capable of healing a living creature or damaging an undead creature with a touch.

name: Life Boost
trait: Focus, Healing, Hex, Manipulate, Uncommon, Vitality, Witch
summary: Life force from your patron floods into the target, ensuring they can continue doing your patron's will for just a little longer.

name: Life Link
trait: Focus, Healing, Manipulate, Oracle, Uncommon, Vitality
summary: You forge a connection of life energy between you and your target, distributing harm between both of you.

name: Lift Nature's Caul
source: Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death pg. 65
summary: With a wave of the hand, you cause the targets to see the world around them as if a gauzy film had been lifted away to expose the truth that lies below their perceived reality.

name: Lingering Composition
summary: You add a flourish to your composition to extend its benefits.

name: Loremaster's Etude
trigger: You or an ally within range attempts a skill check to Recall Knowledge
summary: You call upon your muse's deep mysteries, granting the target a greater ability to think and recall information.

name: Magic Hide
summary: Your animal companion grows a thicker hide, matted fur, or a harder shell, granting it a +1 status bonus to AC.

name: Magic's Vessel
summary: A creature becomes a divine receptacle for pure magical energy.

name: Moonbeam
trait: Attack, Cleric, Concentrate, Fire, Focus, Light, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: You shine a ray of moonlight.

name: Needle of Vengeance
trait: Focus, Hex, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon, Witch
summary: A long, jagged needle jabs into the target foe's psyche whenever it tries to attack a creature your patron holds in special regard.

name: Nymph's Token
summary: You grant an ally a token of favor.

name: Oathkeeper's Insignia
trigger: You make a promise or deal.
summary: A magical indicator assures a creature that youve upheld your end of a bargain.

name: Object Memory
summary: By touching an object, you draw forth the experience of those who created and used it.

name: Overstuff
summary: Huge amounts of food and drink fill the target.

name: Parch
summary: Dry winds dehydrate a creature.

name: Patron's Puppet
trigger: Your turn begins
summary: At your unspoken plea, your patron temporarily assumes control over your familiar.

name: Perfected Mind
summary: You meditate upon perfection to remove all distractions from your mind.

name: Phase Familiar
trigger: Your familiar would take damage
summary: Your patron momentarily recalls your familiar to the ether, shifting it from its solid, physical form into a ghostly version of itself.

name: Physical Boost
duration: until the end of the target's next turn
summary: You temporarily improve the targets physique.

name: Practice Makes Perfect
trigger: You or an ally within range fails a skill check for a skill in which you or they are trained.
source: Rage of Elements pg. 97 <sup>2.0</sup>, Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 65
summary: The target gains a +2 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +3 bonus if the target has master or better proficiency in the skill.

name: Protective Wards
summary: You expand a ring of glyphs that shields your allies.

name: Protector's Sacrifice
trigger: An ally within 30 feet takes damage
summary: You protect your ally by suffering in their stead.

name: Pushing Gust
trait: Air, Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: Giving the air a push, you buffet the target with a powerful gust of wind; it must attempt a Fortitude save.

name: Qi Rush
summary: Accelerated by your qi, you move with such speed you become a blur.

name: Read Fate
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Prediction, Uncommon
summary: You attempt to learn more about the target's fate in the short term, usually within the next day for most prosaic creatures, or the next hour or less for someone likely to have multiple rapid experiences, such as someone actively adventuring.

name: Redact
target: unattended written materials of up to 1 Bulk or less
summary: You strike mention of a specific name from one or more documents.

name: Rejuvenating Flames
trait: Fire, Healing, Necromancy, Sorcerer, Uncommon, Focus
source: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 74
summary: You create a gout of flame that both heals and burns.

name: Rising Surf
trait: Druid, Focus, Manipulate, Move, Uncommon, Water
source: Rage of Elements pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup>, Secrets of Magic pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup>
summary: You create a wave of water that you ride, banking around obstacles and surfing to higher ground.

name: Savor the Sting
trait: Cleric, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Nonlethal, Uncommon
summary: You inflict pain upon the target and revel in their anguish.

name: Scholarly Recollection
trigger: You attempt a Perception check to Seek, or you attempt a skill check to Recall Knowledge with a skill youre trained in
summary: Speaking a short prayer as you gather your thoughts, you're blessed to find yourself pointed in the right direction.

name: Scramble Body
summary: Your magic throws the creature's biology into disarray, inducing nausea, fever, and other unpleasant conditions.

name: Sepulchral Mask
trait: Divination, Emotion, Mental, Sorcerer, Uncommon, Visual, Focus
summary: You manifest a supernatural funerary mask, granting you a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws against emotion effects for 1 minute.

name: Serrate
summary: With a pinch, the metal of a weapon twists, adding numerous jagged blades along its surface.

name: Share Burden
trigger: An ally within 30 feet is about to attempt a saving throw against a harmful emotion effect, and you would not otherwise have to save against the effect.
summary: You shoulder some of your allys pain.

name: Shielding Strike
summary: As you attack a foe, warding magic transforms your momentum into action and lifts your shield.

name: Shields of the Spirit
trait: Champion, Concentrate, Focus, Sanctified, Spirit, Uncommon
summary: You Raise your Shield, causing ephemeral spirit shields to float within your champion's aura.

name: Shooting Star
requirement: You're wielding a ranged weapon or a thrown weapon.
summary: You let loose a projectile that flies true and leaves the blazing trail of a meteor behind it.

name: Slime Spit
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Poison, Ranger, Uncommon
summary: You spit toxic goo that coats your targets face and eyes, dealing 2d6 poison damage.

name: Snare Hopping
summary: You may not have placed your snare in the right place, but you can magically move it there.

name: Soothing Words
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Emotion, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: You attempt to calm the target by uttering soothing words in a calm and even tone.

name: Soul Siphon
summary: You siphon off a portion of the target's soul to bolster your own vitality.

name: Spinning Staff
summary: You spin your staff with a twirling flourish, attacking two foes and transforming the momentum into magical energy to charge for your next Spellstrike.

name: Split the Tongue
trigger: A creature within 30 feet fails a Deception or Diplomacy check.
source: Pathfinder #161: Belly of the Black Whale pg. 75
summary: The deceiving creature's tongue splits like a serpent's tongue.

name: Spray of Stars
trait: Concentrate, Fire, Focus, Light, Manipulate, Oracle, Uncommon
summary: You fling a spray of tiny shooting stars, dealing 2d4 fire damage.

name: String of Fate
summary: You bond yourself to a cherished friend, vowing to share their fate for good or for ill.

name: Stumbling Curse
trait: Curse, Hex, Transmutation, Uncommon, Witch, Focus
summary: With a twist of a finger, you send a creature careening on a haphazard trajectory.

name: Sudden Shift
trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
duration: until the end of your next turn
summary: You swiftly move from a dangerous spot and veil yourself.

name: Swarmsense
summary: You extend your senses through a multitude of crawling and flying creatures.

name: Sweet Dreams
trait: Auditory, Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Linguistic, Manipulate, Mental, Sleep, Uncommon
summary: With soothing words, you lull the target into an enchanting dream.

name: Tempest Surge
trait: Air, Concentrate, Druid, Electricity, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: You surround a foe in a swirling storm of violent winds, roiling clouds, and crackling lightning.

name: Tempest Touch
trait: Cold, Focus, Manipulate, Oracle, Uncommon, Water
summary: Your touch calls forth a churning mass of icy water that clings to your target, dealing 1d4 bludgeoning damage and 1d4 cold damage.

name: Temporal Distortion
summary: You share some of your own temporal distortions with a foe, altering their mind and body unpredictably as they're thrown backward or forward in time.

name: Tentacular LImbs
summary: Your arms turn into long, pliable tentacles, increasing your reach when you're delivering touch range spells and making unarmed Strikes with your arms (such as fist and claw Strikes) to 10 feet.

name: Thunderous Strike
requirement: You're wielding a melee weapon in two hands.
summary: You swing your massive weapon, creating a wave of sonic vibrations that topples creatures.

name: Tidal Surge
summary: You call forth a tremendous wave to move the target either in a body of water or on the ground.

name: Touch of Obedience
summary: Your imperious touch erodes the target's willpower, making it easier to control.

name: Touch of the Void
target: 1 willing undead creature or 1 living creature
summary: You infuse the target with void energy, healing undead or damaging a living creature.

name: Touch of Undeath
summary: You attack the target's life force with undeath, dealing 1d6 void damage.

name: Undeath's Blessing
summary: You instill within a creature the touch of the grave.

name: Unfetter Eidolon
summary: You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time.

name: Unimpeded Stride
summary: Divine grace ensure that nothing can keep you prisoner or hold you back.

name: Unraveling Blast
summary: You unleash a small blast of potential that destroys one of a creature's possible futures, leaving them reeling.

name: Untamed Form
trait: Concentrate, Druid, Focus, Manipulate, Polymorph, Uncommon
summary: You reach within for a different part of yourself, and you set it free, transforming your body into another form.

name: Untamed Shift
trait: Concentrate, Druid, Focus, Manipulate, Morph, Uncommon
summary: You transform just a part of your body.

name: Updraft
trait: Air, Concentrate, Druid, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
source: Rage of Elements pg. 60 <sup>2.0</sup>, Secrets of Magic pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup>
summary: A powerful blast of wind erupts from the ground, launching the target into the air and sending it crashing back down.

name: Veil of Confidence
summary: You surround yourself in confidence.

name: Veil of Dreams
trait: Focus, Hex, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Your patron draws the target into a drowsy state, causing daydreams and sluggishness.

name: Vibrant Thorns
trait: Cleric, Focus, Manipulate, Morph, Plant, Uncommon, Wood
summary: Your body sprouts brambly thorns that thrive on life magic.

name: Victory Cry
trigger: An ally within range critically succeeds at a melee Strike
summary: Your true might comes from your bonds with your allies, and you glory in their achievements.

name: Waking Nightmare
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon
summary: You fill the creature's mind with a terrifying vision.

name: Warped Terrain
summary: You create illusory hazards that cover all surfaces in the area.

name: Weapon Surge
duration: until the start of your next turn
summary: Holding your weapon aloft, you fill it with divine energy.

name: Weapon Trance
summary: The serenity of violence fills your mind, giving you a heightened sense of knowing exactly where your weapons need to be.

name: Whispering Quiet
summary: You suppress sound in an area, preventing anyone from giving away valuable secrets.

name: Wildfire
trait: Concentrate, Druid, Fire, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
source: Rage of Elements pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup>, Secrets of Magic pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup>
summary: A thin layer of ash and flame covers the ground in the area.

name: Winter Bolt
summary: You fling a hollow icicle filled with winters wrath.

name: Withering Grasp
summary: Your touch rots organic material and decays objects.

name: Word of Truth
summary: You speak a statement that you believe to be true and that is free of any attempt to deceive through twisting words, omission, and so on.

name: Zenith Star
summary: You call a tiny star to orbit a creature in a sparkling halo before shooting up into the heavens, where it marks the creatures rough location.

name: Animal Feature
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Morph, Ranger, Uncommon
summary: Without fully transforming your body, you gain one animalistic feature, which you select from the list below each time you Cast the Spell.

name: Canopy Crawler
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Morph, Ranger, Uncommon
summary: The target grows a prehensile tail, or gains prehensile qualities in their existing tail, to help them climb with ease.

name: Enlarge Companion
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Polymorph, Ranger, Uncommon
summary: Your animal companion grows much larger, towering over its foes in battle.

name: Harmonize Self
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Healing, Monk, Uncommon, Vitality
summary: You heal yourself in one of the following ways, chosen by you when you cast the spell.

name: Hunter's Luck
trigger: You attempt a check to Recall Knowledge about a creature, but you havent rolled yet
summary: You have a preternatural ability to remember details about your foes.

name: Imitate Fauna
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Illusion, Manipulate, Ranger, Uncommon
summary: You use your knowledge of nature to pass the target off as a common animal of the same size, representing a species chosen when the spell is cast.

name: Invoke the Crimson Oath
summary: Unleash a blast of ruby light, striking all before you.

name: Lifelink Surge
trait: Healing, Necromancy, Positive, Summoner, Uncommon, Focus
summary: You make a quick gesture, tracing the link between yourself and your eidolon and drawing on your connection to slowly strengthen your shared life force.

name: Light of Revelation
trait: Champion, Divination, Light, Revelation, Uncommon, Focus
summary: Shed light, granting a bonus to Perception.

name: Magic Warrior Aspect
summary: Gain the speed and senses of your totem animal.

name: Magic Warrior Transformation
summary: transform into your totem animal.

name: Perfect Strike
trigger: You miss a Strike with an unarmed attack.
summary: Reroll a missed unarmed strike.

name: Soothing Mist
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Healing, Manipulate, Ranger, Uncommon, Vitality
target: 1 willing living creature or 1 undead creature
summary: You call forth a magical mist that envelops a creature.

name: Spirit of the Beast
trait: Concentrate, Flourish, Focus, Morph, Primal, Uncommon
summary: You bring out the spirit of another animal that lives within your companion.

name: Sun Blade
trait: Evocation, Fire, Light, Positive, Uncommon, Focus
summary: Launch a bolt of divine sunfire.

name: Vision of Weakness
summary: You focus your gaze on a creature and gain a flash of divine insight into its nature.

name: Aberrant Whispers
trait: Auditory, Concentrate, Focus, Mental, Sorcerer, Uncommon
summary: You utter phrases in an unknown tongue, assaulting the minds of those nearby.

name: Access Lore
summary: You sift through the multiverse's divine knowledge, seeking out tidbits related to a particular subject.

name: Ancestral Defense
trait: Focus, Fortune, Manipulate, Mental, Oracle, Uncommon
trigger: You are about to attempt a Will save.
summary: Your ancestor protects you against those who would bend your will.

name: Angelic Wings
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Light, Manipulate, Sorcerer, Uncommon
summary: Wings of pure light spread out from your back, granting you a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

name: Armor of Bones
summary: You ossify your physical form, mimicking the durability of bone.

name: Battlefield Persistence
trigger: You are about to attempt a saving throw, but you havent rolled yet.
summary: You're difficult to deter in battle.

name: Beastmaster Trance
trait: Archetype, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon
target: one animal companion you can perceive
source: Player Core 2 pg. 189, Advanced Player's Guide pg. 161 <sup>2.0</sup>
summary: You enter a trance that allows you to see through the senses of the target companion.

name: Blinding Beauty
trait: Emotion, Enchantment, Incapacitation, Sorcerer, Uncommon, Visual, Focus
summary: You channel the allure of your nymph bloodline into a terribly beautiful glance.

name: Blood in the Water
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Hex, Manipulate, Spirit, Uncommon, Witch
requirement: The target is taking persistent bleed damage or your last action dealt slashing damage to the target.
summary: Predators are drawn to the scent of blood, and blood can disperse shockingly far in the water.

name: Cascade Countermeasure
duration: until the Arcane Cascade stance ends
summary: You quickly adjust your Arcane Cascade to offer magical protection.

name: Combustion
trait: Concentrate, Druid, Fire, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
source: Rage of Elements pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup>, Secrets of Magic pg. 200 <sup>1.1</sup>
summary: You ignite a creature in lasting flames.

name: Deceiver's Cloak
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Hex, Illusion, Manipulate, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Your patron drapes a cloak of illusion about you, making you appear as another creature of the same body shape with roughly similar height and weight as yourself.

name: Delay Affliction
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Healing, Manipulate, Oracle, Uncommon, Vitality
summary: With a surge of healing energy, you push back against an affliction threatening the target and grant a small amount of healing.

name: Dragon Breath
summary: You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 damage with a basic Reflex save.

name: Drain LIfe
summary: You close your hand and pull life energy from another creature into yourself.

name: Eidolon's Wrath
summary: Your eidolon releases a powerful energy attack.

name: Electrified Crystal Ward
source: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 75
summary: You create an electric latch rune hazard on the target, creating a special crystalline lock on the object.

name: Elemental Motion
summary: You call upon your element to propel you, improving your Speed depending on your element.

name: Embrace the Pit
summary: Devil horns grow from your skull, and your skin takes on features of the devil responsible for your diabolic bloodline.

name: Ephemeral Tracking
summary: You can look at currents in the air and water and see tracks that you can follow just as you would on land.

name: Extend Blood Magic
summary: You call upon the arcane energy coursing through your blood to extend the magic it grants.

name: Extend Spell
summary: You call upon your bloods knowledge of the ancients to extend your magic.

name: Eyes of the Dead
target: one undead creature under your control
summary: You enter a magical trance that allows you to perceive through the senses of the target creature.

name: Fey Disappearance
duration: until the end of your next turn
summary: You become invisible and ignore natural difficult terrain (such as underbrush).

name: Heart's Desire
trait: Emotion, Illusion, Mental, Sorcerer, Uncommon, Focus
summary: You surround your target with wondrous illusions of their greatest desires, which distract them from reality.

name: Horrific Visage
trait: Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Focus, Illusion, Manipulate, Mental, Sorcerer, Uncommon, Visual
summary: You briefly transform your features into the horrific visage of a hag, striking fear into your enemies.

name: Incendiary Ashes
trait: Cursebound, Evocation, Fire, Oracle, Uncommon, Focus
source: Pathfinder #185: A Taste of Ashes pg. 81
summary: A cloud of magical ashes descends upon creatures in the area.

name: Inscrutable Mask
summary: You shroud your form and features in an impenetrable mask of shadow.

name: Interstellar Void
trait: Cold, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Oracle, Uncommon
summary: You call upon the frigid depths of outer space to bring a terrible chill to your enemy.

name: Invoke the Harrow
summary: You draw a card from the harrow, either one from a deck you have in hand or magically produce one as part of the spell.

name: Ki Cutting Sight
summary: Ki flows through everything. Strike at just the right place with dire consequences

name: Litany Against Wrath
trait: Champion, Evocation, Good, Litany, Uncommon, Focus
summary: Your litany rails against the sin of wrath, punishing the target for attacking good creatures.

name: Malicious Shadow
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Hex, Manipulate, Shadow, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Your patron warps the target's shadow into a deadly form, such as strangling hands, a dangerous weapon, harrying runes, or the like.

name: Mycological Malady
trait: Concentrate, Disease, Focus, Hex, Manipulate, Uncommon, Witch
summary: You infect your target with fungal spores to hasten the cycle of decay.

name: Personal Blizzard
summary: Your patron's breath becomes a blizzard of obscuring, scouring ice that follows your target.

name: Powerful Inhalation
trait: Air, Concentrate, Druid, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
source: Rage of Elements pg. 60 <sup>2.0</sup>, Secrets of Magic pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup>
summary: You rapidly draw the air from your surroundings, hoarding it for yourself.

name: Pulverizing Cascade
trait: Concentrate, Druid, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon, Water
source: Rage of Elements pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup>, Secrets of Magic pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup>
summary: You raise a pair of towering waves and slam them into each other, crushing creatures caught between them.

name: Qi Blast
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Force, Manipulate, Monk, Uncommon
summary: You unleash your qi as a powerful blast that deals 2d6 force damage.

name: Ranger's Bramble
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Plant, Ranger, Uncommon
area: all squares that contain plants in a 5-foot burst
summary: You cause plants in the area to entangle your foes, with the effects of _entangling flora_.

name: Return the Favor
trigger: An ally uses a reaction to grant you a beneficial effect during a combat encounter
summary: You're unable to leave any debts unpaid.

name: Sheltering Wings
trigger: An ally moves through a square within 15 feet of you or uses an action that has the move trait.
summary: Like migratory birds, you know everyone flies farther together.

name: Shrink the Span
summary: The world seems to shrink before your footfalls.

name: Shroud of Flame
source: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 74
summary: You encircle yourself in an aura of protective flames.

name: Spirit Veil
summary: You draw an occluding veil of spirits around yourself, blocking yourself especially well from undead eyes.

name: Steal Shadow
summary: You steal a creature's shadow, leaving it weakened and vulnerable.

name: Stone Lance
trait: Attack, Concentrate, Druid, Earth, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
source: Rage of Elements pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup>, Secrets of Magic pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup>
summary: You conjure a jagged lance of stone and then launch it at a foe.

name: Subjugate Undead
target: one undead creature with a level of no more than your level - 4
summary: You attempt to seize control of the target undead.

name: Sun's Fury
target: 1 weapon without an _unholy_ rune that is unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally
summary: The target weapon becomes wreathed in a glowing flame.

name: Swamp of Sloth
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Olfactory, Sorcerer, Uncommon
summary: Ground in the area turns swampy and fetid.

name: Threatening Mimicry
trait: Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Focus, Illusion, Manipulate, Mental, Ranger, Uncommon
summary: You appear larger and stronger to nearby creatures, appearing to possess threatening features like antlers, claws, or poison to their senses.

name: Thunderburst
trait: Air, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Oracle, Sonic, Uncommon
summary: You create a powerful blast of air and a loud peal of thunder, dealing 2d6 bludgeoning damage and 2d6 sonic damage.

name: Time Skip
summary: You manipulate time around your ally, pushing them forward a few moments in time.

name: Unblinking Flame Revelation
requirement: Your previous action was a successful unarmed Strike.
summary: Suppress illusions on your target.

name: Unbreaking Wave Advance
summary: Unleash a blast of water to push back foes.

name: Unfolding Wind Rush
summary: Run across the wind.

name: Untwisting Iron Buffer
summary: Gain temporary hit points.

name: Warning Stripes
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Morph, Poison, Ranger, Uncommon
summary: Your skin becomes painted with vivid stripes or bright aposematic swirls, warning other creatures of its toxic qualities.

name: Whirling Flames
trait: Fire, Focus, Focus, Manipulate, Oracle, Uncommon
area: up to two 5-foot bursts that dont overlap
summary: #VALUE!

name: Achaekek's Clutch
summary: You mark the holy symbol of Achaekek in a visible location on the target's body.

name: Adaptive Ablation
trigger: You take acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage.
summary: You shift yourself to adapt to the mystical wavelengths of the energy damage, protecting yourself from further harm.

name: Artistic Flourish
target: 1 item or work of art that fits entirely within the range
summary: You transform the target into a form that more closes matches your creative vision.

name: Asterism
summary: Lines of burning starlight form a constellation around you.

name: Bottle the Storm
trigger: You would take electricity damage.
summary: When lightning is turned at you, you store the charge safely within yourself, unleashing it when the time is right.

name: Captivating Adoration
trait: Aura, Cleric, Concentrate, Emotion, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon, Visual
summary: You become intensely entrancing, and creatures are distracted by you as long as they remain within the area.

name: Clinging Shadows Stance
trait: Focus, Manipulate, Monk, Shadow, Stance, Uncommon
summary: You adopt the stance of clinging shadows.

name: Commanding Lash
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Linguistic, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon
target: a creature you dealt damage to on your most recent action
duration: until the end of the target's next turn
requirement: Your most recent action dealt damage to a target
summary: With the threat of more pain, you compel a creature you've recently harmed.

name: Community Restoration
trigger: You Cast a Spell from a wizard spell slot, and the spell affects one or more willing allies without damaging them
summary: When you use your magic to support your allies, shared strength bolsters you all.

name: Competitive Edge
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Emotion, Focus, Mental, Uncommon
summary: Your competitiveness drives you to prove yourself against the opposition.

name: Confront Selves
summary: You show the target the spiraling web of actions and consequences that is their life and the changes wrought by these decisions upon themselves and those around them.

name: Darkened Sight
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Darkness, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: You infuse a creature's vision with darkness.

name: Debilitating Dichotomy
trait: Cursebound, Evocation, Mental, Oracle, Uncommon, Focus
summary: You reveal a glimpse of the impossible conflicts between the divine anathema behind your curse, forcing you to reckon with another's conflicts as well.

name: Delusional Pride
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Emotion, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon
summary: You make the target overconfident, leading it to ascribe failure to external factors.

name: Destructive Aura
trait: Aura, Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: Swirling sands of divine devastation surround you, weakening the defenses of all they touch.

name: Diamond Dust
summary: You supercool the nearby air, forming a cloud of dancing ice crystals in an emanation around you.

name: Dimensional Steps
summary: You teleport a short distance.

name: Disperse into Air
trait: Air, Cleric, Focus, Manipulate, Polymorph, Uncommon
trigger: You take damage from an enemy or a hazard
summary: After taking the triggering damage, you transform into air.

name: Door to Beyond
summary: Striking at thin air, you create hairline cracks in an unoccupied adjacent space that lead somewhere outside reality.

name: Downpour
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon, Water
summary: You call forth a torrential downpour, which extinguishes non-magical flames.

name: Dread Aura
trait: Aura, Emotion, Enchantment, Fear, Mental, Uncommon, Wizard, Focus
summary: You emit an aura of terror.

name: Dreamer's Call
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Illusion, Incapacitation, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon
duration: until the end of the target's next turn
summary: You create a vivid, illusory daydream drawn from the images of the target's dreams.

name: Dust Storm
summary: You call forth a swirling storm of dust.

name: Dutiful Challenge
summary: As you challenge an enemy, you take some of its attention away from your allies.

name: Ectoplasmic Interstice
summary: You force the Material and Ethereal Planes to partially overlap, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures.

name: Elemental Tempest
summary: Your spellcasting surrounds you in a storm of elemental energy.

name: Enduring Might
trigger: An attack or effect would deal damage to you
summary: Your own might mingles with divine power to protect you from harm.

name: Energy Absorption
trigger: An effect would deal acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage to you
summary: You're used to mitigating the damage done by bombs, siege engines, and magical artillery.

name: Ephemeral Hazards
summary: You create illusory hazards, such as spinning blades or a puddle of acid.

name: Eradicate Undeath
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon, Vitality
summary: A massive deluge of life energy causes the undead to fall apart.

name: Euphoric Renewal
summary: You view death not as an ending but a beginning, and you delight in dancing on its edge.

name: Fallow Field
summary: A sickly yellow light fills the area as entropic forces prevent healing.

name: Familiar Form
summary: You transform into a Tiny animal that commonly serves as a spellcaster's familiar.

name: Fearful Feast
trigger: A creature within range becomes frightened.
source: Abomination Vaults Hardcover pg. 211, Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death pg. 65
summary: You open your mouth wide and inhale sharply; you draw in the bravery, self-confidence, and hope to which the frightened target clings and then strip away the target's false assumption that these fragile emotions can save them from the oblivion of terror.

name: Flame Barrier
trigger: An effect would deal fire damage to you or an ally within range
target: one creature that would take fire damage from the triggering effect
summary: You swiftly deflect incoming flames.

name: Font of Serenity
summary: A divine beacon radiates serenity, soothing nearby allies.

name: Fortissimo Composition
summary: You call upon your muse to greatly increase the benefits you provide with your courageous anthem, rallying anthem, or song of strength composition.

name: Foul Miasma
summary: You multiply the disease within a creature, drawing it into an infectious mist outside their body where it can spread to other creatures.

name: Ghostly Transcription
summary: Glowing letters assemble in the air, providing a transcription of the targets speech in all languages you speak.

name: Glimpse the Truth
trait: Aura, Cleric, Focus, Manipulate, Revelation, Uncommon
summary: Divine insight lets you see things as they are, unveiled by attempts to magically cloak the truth.

name: Inevitable Destination
summary: You twist the paths of the target, ensuring that each one leads to you.

name: Interdisciplinary Incantation
trigger: A creature within 30 feet casts an arcane spell
summary: You gather the embers of another caster's spell, using your understanding of unified magic to pick apart their formulas and incantations well enough to imitate the spell yourself, if only for a short time.

name: Invisibility Cloak
summary: You become invisible, with the same restrictions as the 2nd-rank _invisibility_ spell.

name: Isolation
summary: You summon a tangible manifestation of loneliness to cloak the target from view as surely as if it were wreathed in darkness.

name: Know the Enemy
trigger: You roll initiative and can see a creature, you succeed at an attack roll against a creature, or a creature fails a saving throw against one of your spells
summary: You quickly remind yourself of useful information.

name: Life Siphon
trigger: You expend one of your wizard spell slots to cast a wizard spell of the necromancy school.
summary: You use some of the spells magic to heal yourself.

name: Localized Quake
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Earth, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: You shake the earth, toppling nearby creatures.

name: Lucky Break
trigger: You fail, but dont critically fail, a saving throw
summary: Reroll the saving throw and use the better result.

name: Malignant Sustenance
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon, Void
summary: You embed a seed of void energy in an undead creature, restoring its unnatural vigor over time.

name: Mantis Form
summary: Transform into a mantis battle form.

name: Mystic Beacon
duration: until the start of your next turn
summary: The next damaging or healing spell the target casts before the start of your next turn deals damage or restores Hit Points as if the spell were heightened 1 rank higher than its actual rank.

name: Nature's Bounty
trait: Cleric, Focus, Manipulate, Plant, Uncommon, Vitality
summary: A palm-sized raw fruit or vegetable of your choice appears in your open hand.

name: Ordained Purpose
source: Pathfinder #161: Belly of the Black Whale pg. 75
summary: You call upon the authority of cosmic forces of order, overwhelming creatures with remorse and agony for acting outside of their station and purpose.

name: Overflowing Sorrow
summary: Sadness flows out of you into nearby creatures, blotting out any other thoughts they had.

name: Path of Least Resistance
summary: You trace several possible routes, quickly resetting the timeline until you find the safest one.

name: Perfected Body
trigger: You fail or critically fail a saving throw against an effect that has the morph, poison, or polymorph trait, or that would make you clumsy, doomed, enfeebled, petrified, or sickened
summary: Your body's perfection keeps you just a little bit healthier than most.

name: Precious Metals
target: 1 metal shield or weapon, 1 suit of metal armor, or up to 1 Bulk of metal material (such as coins or metal-tipped ammunition)
summary: Your deity blesses base metals to transform them into precious materials.

name: Protector's Sphere
trait: Aura, Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: A protective aura emanates out from you, safeguarding you and your allies.

name: Pulse of Civilization
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Scrying, Uncommon
summary: You tap into the zeitgeist of any settlements in range.

name: Purifying Veil
trait: Cleric, Evocation, Good, Rare, Water, Focus
summary: Drawing on the purifying powers of water, you call forth a veil of fine water droplets suffused with holy energy.

name: Rebuke Death
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Healing, Manipulate, Uncommon, Vitality
target: 1 living creature per action spent to Cast this spell
summary: You snatch creatures from the jaws of death, restoring them without the strain of a typical close call.

name: Remember the Lost
summary: You call upon the lost and forgotten, assailing your foes minds with the memories of those who died with a grievance toward them.

name: Repel Metal
trigger: A Strike with a metallic weapon or projectile would hit you or an ally within range
target: the creature targeted by the triggering Strike
summary: You call forth a repelling field.

name: Retributive Pain
trait: Cleric, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Nonlethal, Uncommon
trigger: A creature in range damages you
summary: You vengefully reflect your pain upon your tormentor.

name: Roar of the Wyrm
summary: You channel the might of dragons into your voice, letting out a roar that engenders respect in dragonkind but that instills fear in most other creatures.

name: Rune of Observation
summary: You inscribe an invisible eye-shaped rune in the air, creating a sensor as _clairvoyance_.

name: Runic Impression
target: you or one weapon you're wielding
summary: Your unarmed attacks or weapon gain the benefits of a weapon rune you choose when you cast this spell.

name: Safeguard Secret
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon
target: you and any number of willing allies
summary: You ensure a secret remains safe from prying spies.

name: Shaken Confidence
trait: Cleric, Emotion, Enchantment, Mental, Misfortune, Rare, Focus
trigger: An enemy within 30 feet of you critically fails an attack roll, Perception check, or skill check
summary: You mock the target for all its failings, twisting its selfconfidence into doubt.

name: Shared Nightmare
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Emotion, Focus, Incapacitation, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon
summary: Merging minds with the target, you swap distressing visions.

name: Shifting Form
summary: You change your body to better suit the moment.

name: Songbird's Call
trait: Aura, Bard, Composition, Concentrate, Uncommon, Focus
summary: Your voice calls a storm of songbirds that whirl around you and peck at your enemies.

name: Spiral of Horrors
trait: Aura, Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon, Wizard
summary: Shades and spirits howl and whirl around you in a display that strikes fear into the hearts of all who witness it.

name: Stasis
target: 1 creature or up to 1 Bulk of objects
summary: The flow of time congeals around an object or creature, holding it in place.

name: Stormwind Flight
trait: Air, Concentrate, Druid, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon
summary: Powerful winds carry you through the air, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

name: Swarm Form
summary: You discorporate into a swarm of Tiny creatures.

name: Take its Course
summary: When someone has overindulged, you can hasten them past the worst of their affliction or intensify their misery.

name: Tempt Fate
trigger: You or an ally within range attempts a saving throw
summary: You twist the forces of fate to make a moment dire or uneventful, with no in-between.

name: Tireless Worker
source: Rage of Elements pg. 97 <sup>2.0</sup>, Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 65
summary: You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that's affecting the target: clumsy, encumbered, enfeebled, or fatigued.

name: Touch of the Moon
summary: When you touch the target, a symbol of the moon appears on its forehead, glowing with soft moonlight.

name: Transcribe Moment
summary: You instantly create a small, permanent scroll that contains a magically precise written description of your current surroundings in every direction.

name: Traveler's Transit
summary: You add power to your muscles, allowing you to swim or climb walls with ease.

name: Trickster's Twin
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Focus, Illusion, Manipulate, Uncommon, Visual
summary: You rarely settle for being in just one place.

name: Unity
trigger: You and 1 or more allies within range are targeted by a spell or ability that allows a saving throw
target: each ally targeted by the triggering spell
summary: You put up a united defense.

name: Vital Luminance
trait: Aura, Cleric, Focus, Light, Manipulate, Uncommon, Vitality
summary: Drawing life force into yourself, you become a beacon of vitality.

name: Waking Dream
summary: You cloud the target's mind with vivid, dreamlike imagery, so they have difficulty distinguishing real threats from imagined ones.

name: Weaponize Secret
summary: You understand that holding a secret is in itself a kind of power.

name: Wild Winds Stance
trait: Air, Focus, Manipulate, Monk, Stance, Uncommon

name: Wind Whispers
trait: Cleric, Enchantment, Linguistic, Mental, Rare, Focus

name: Wood Walk
trait: Concentrate, Druid, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon, Wood
summary: Wood shapes itself according to your will readily, making staircases appear as you climb up the side of a tree, automatically weaving vines into ladders, or lowering branches to lift you up to the top.

name: Word of Freedom
summary: You utter a liberating word of power that frees a creature.

name: Wordsmith
target: 1 document written by a single author and comprised of written text in a single language
duration: until the next time you Refocus
summary: You're a devotee of knowledge with an unmatched command of the language used to spread that knowledge, and you can reshape the written word into a form more understandable to your audience.

name: Zeal for Battle
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Emotion, Focus, Fortune, Mental, Uncommon
trigger: You and at least 1 ally are about to roll initiative
summary: You stoke the righteous anger within yourself and an ally.

name: Abyssal Wrath
summary: You evoke the energy of an Abyssal realm.

name: Arcane Countermeasure
trigger: A creature within range that you can see Casts a Spell.
target: the spell cast by the triggering creature
summary: You undermine the target spell, making it easier to defend against.

name: Celestial Brand
summary: A blazing symbol appears on the target, cursing it to face divine justice.

name: Chthonian Wrath
summary: You evoke the energy of a part of the Outer Rifts.

name: Cleansing Flames
trait: Fire, Healing, Necromancy, Sorcerer, Uncommon, Focus
source: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 74

name: Consuming Darkness

name: Curse of Death
trait: Concentrate, Curse, Death, Focus, Hex, Manipulate, Uncommon, Void, Witch
summary: Your patron wraps a hand around your target's heart.

name: Dance of Darkness
summary: You dance, Striding up to half your Speed.

name: Dragon Wings
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Morph, Sorcerer, Uncommon

name: Elemental Blast

name: Establish Ward
summary: You bind a part of your essence to your surroundings, creating a warded area that grants you power within it, but drains you outside of it.

name: Fey Glamour
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Illusion, Manipulate, Sorcerer, Uncommon
summary: You call upon fey glamours to cloak an area or the targets in illusion.

name: Glacial Heart

name: Gluttonous Growth
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Plant, Ranger, Uncommon
area: all squares that contain plants in a 20-foot burst
summary: Plants in the area grow rapidly, taking on carnivorous characteristics as they seek to consume prey.

name: Grasping Grave
summary: Hundreds of skeletal arms erupt from the ground in the area, clawing at creatures within and attempting to hold them in place.

name: Hellfire Plume
trait: Concentrate, Fire, Focus, Manipulate, Sorcerer, Spirit, Uncommon
summary: You call forth a plume of hellfire that erupts from below

name: Hunter's Vision
summary: Your target glows with a magical aura visible only to you and those who follow your lead.

name: Litany against Sloth
trait: Champion, Evocation, Good, Litany, Uncommon, Focus
summary: Your litany rails against the sin of sloth, interfering with the targets ability to react.

name: Litany of Self-Interest
trait: Champion, Enchantment, Evil, Litany, Mental, Uncommon, Focus
summary: You give a speech that fills your target with a drive to improve themself to the exclusion of assisting others.

name: Ode to Ouroboros
trigger: A creatures dying condition would reach the value at which they would die
summary: Your ode staves off death.

name: Over the Coals
trait: Hex, Mental, Necromancy, Rare, Witch, Focus
summary: You accuse the target of breaking its word to you and invoke the wrath of your patron to claim what's due, demanding the target pay you in currency, fulfill an order, or stand down.

name: Pack Breaker
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Ranger, Uncommon
summary: You can deceive creatures by changing their perception of their allies behavior.

name: Pulverizing Wake
trait: Attack, Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Ranger, Sonic, Uncommon

name: Restorative Moment
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Hex, Manipulate, Uncommon, Witch
summary: Your patron weaves the threads of time around the target, giving them some of the benefits of a day's passage.

name: Rewrite Possibility
trait: Divination, Fortune, Mental, Prediction, Sorcerer, Uncommon, Focus
summary: You continually glimpse into the target's future and nudge fate to guide them toward the best possible outcome.

name: Shadow Jump
requirement: You are in dim light or darkness
summary: You instantly transport yourself from one shadow to another.

name: Shall Not Falter, Shall Not Rout

name: Shepherd of Souls
trigger: A living creature within 30 feet takes damage.
summary: You stay the hand of fate for one not yet destined to die, sacrificing some of your own vitality to heal them.

name: Spectral Advance
trait: Champion, Concentrate, Focus, Polymorph, Spirit, Uncommon
summary: Taking on a spiritual form, you flash across the battlefield to engage an enemy.

name: Spellmaster's Ward
summary: You create one or more glowing protective runes that revolve around you.

name: Steal the Sky
trigger: You make a successful unarmed Strike against a flying creature.
source: Impossible Lands pg. 225, Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under pg. 79
summary: You deny a flying creature the support of the air.

name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
summary: Your symphony lifts listeners from their worldly concerns.

name: Terrain Transposition
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Ranger, Teleportation, Uncommon
summary: You mystically transpose your current location with another.

name: Unblinking Flame Aura
summary: You focus your sight inside and call on your inner fire to grant you warmth, steady your vision, and soothe your body.

name: Unbreaking Wave Vapor
trigger: You're targeted by an attack made by an attacker you can see.
summary: You're concealed against the triggering attack and gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against it.

name: Unfolding Wind Buffet
summary: You surround your unarmed attacks with the speed and force of air.

name: Untwisting Iron Roots
summary: You manipulate the earth beneath your feet to throw your enemies off balance, leaving chunks of rock and rubble behind.

name: Unusual Anatomy
summary: You transform your flesh and organs into a bizarre amalgam of glistening skin, rough scales, tufts of hair, and tumorous protuberances.

name: Wind Jump
summary: You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

name: Wish-Twisted Form
summary: You focus your magic upon an enemy, wishing for their defenses to fail and turning their strengths into weaknesses.

name: Wronged Monk's Wrath
trait: Electricity, Evocation, Force, Monk, Uncommon, Focus
source: Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 77
summary: You unleash your ki as a powerful storm of force and lightning.

name: You're Mine
trait: Concentrate, Emotion, Focus, Incapacitation, Manipulate, Mental, Sorcerer, Uncommon
summary: You manipulate the target's emotions, potentially allowing you to control it for a brief instant.

name: Ancestral Form
summary: You take the form of your ancestral spirits, becoming invisible and quasi-corporeal.

name: Ash Form
source: Pathfinder #185: A Taste of Ashes pg. 81
summary: You take the form of a cloud of minuscule ash particles.

name: Champion's Sacrifice
trigger: An ally is hit by a Strike or fails a saving throw against an effect that doesnt affect you.
summary: You form a link with an ally, allowing you to take harm in their stead.

name: Claim Undead
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Incapacitation, Manipulate, Oracle, Uncommon
summary: You attempt to wrest control of a target undead or force it to recognize you as its master.

name: Dread Secret
trait: Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Oracle, Uncommon
duration: until the start of your next turn
summary: You utter a powerful secret at odds with the fundamental nature of the target creatures.

name: Flaming Fusillade
trait: Concentrate, Fire, Focus, Manipulate, Oracle, Uncommon
summary: You call upon an endless barrage of flames, a series of explosions bursting around you like miniature suns.

name: For Love, For Lightning

name: Heroic Feat
trait: Cursebound, Divination, Mental, Oracle, Uncommon, Focus
summary: You gain the ability to perform a specialized combat technique from the vast wealth of martial knowledge your mystery provides.

name: Life-Giving Form
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Healing, Light, Manipulate, Oracle, Uncommon, Vitality
summary: You transcend your physical form, becoming a beacon of healing energy.

name: Manifold Lives
trait: Cursebound, Divination, Emotion, Mental, Oracle, Uncommon, Focus

name: Moonlight Bridge
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Light, Manipulate, Oracle, Uncommon
summary: You summon a bridge of radiant, shimmering moonlight.

name: Primal Summons
summary: You enhance a summoned creature with the power of the elements.

name: Revel in Retribution
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Mental, Oracle, Uncommon
summary: Time seems to slow for you, allowing you to strike your opponents mid-move.

name: Shadow Illusion
trait: Auditory, Illusion, Shadow, Uncommon, Visual, Focus
summary: You create a shadowy illusion of a creature or a stationary object, but the illusion can exist only in an area of dim light or darkness.

name: Shambling Horror
target: 1 corpse of a Gargantuan or smaller creature that has a level no greater than your level  4 and has died since the last sunrise
summary: You reanimate the corpse of a fallen creature as an undead minion under your control.

name: Speaking Sky
source: Impossible Lands pg. 225, Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under pg. 79
summary: The air speaks to you.

name: Tempest Form
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Manipulate, Oracle, Polymorph, Uncommon
summary: Your body becomes fluid.

name: Darklight
summary: Shadows pour forth from your eyes, creating a field of darkness that prevents light from emanating within the area.

name: Hasted Assault
summary: You call upon your magic to speed up your attacks.

name: Litany of Depravity
trait: Champion, Evil, Evocation, Litany, Uncommon, Focus
summary: Your litany calls into question the morals your foe claims to hold dear.

name: Litany of Righteousness
trait: Champion, Evocation, Good, Litany, Uncommon, Focus
summary: Your litany denounces an evildoer, rendering it susceptible to the powers of good.

name: Shadow's Web
summary: Grasping darkness surges from you, dealing 14d4 void damage.

name: Soothing Ballad
trait: Bard, Composition, Concentrate, Emotion, Focus, Healing, Manipulate, Mental, Uncommon
summary: You draw upon your muse to soothe your allies.

name: Unblinking Flame Emblem
trigger: Your last action was a successful Strike against an enemy.
summary: You emblazon the target with a fiery sigil that projects your sight and your flame onto them, allowing you and your allies to track their movements and making it easier to hit them.

name: Unbreaking Wave Barrier
summary: You create a protective circle around yourself that repels your foes.

name: Unfolding Wind Blitz
summary: You blitz forward so quickly that you soar through the air, and nothing can react to you.

name: Untwisting Iron Augmentation
summary: Your unarmed attacks are treated as cold iron and silver, they gain the earth trait, and they gain a +1 status bonus to damage rolls per damage die.

name: Impaling Briars
trait: Concentrate, Druid, Focus, Manipulate, Plant, Uncommon, Wood
summary: The ground within the area transforms into a mass of dangerous briars that assault and impede your foes.

name: Medusa's Wrath
summary: You make an attack filled with a medusa's petrifying power.

name: Touch of Death
trait: Concentrate, Focus, Incapacitation, Manipulate, Monk, Uncommon
summary: Make a melee unarmed Strike.

name: Embrace Nothingness
summary: You empty your body of substance, becoming one with nothingness.

name: Empty Body
summary: You turn ethereal, with the effects of ethereal jaunt, but you dont need to concentrate.

name: Qi Form
summary: Drawing from deep wells of spiritual power, you take on a special qi form.

name: Storm Lord
trait: Air, Concentrate, Druid, Electricity, Focus, Manipulate, Uncommon

name: Unblinking Flame Ignition
trigger: A foe reduces you to half your Hit Points or fewer.
summary: You feel the most alive when pushed into a corner, as the insights and vision granted by the flame stoke into overdrive.

name: Unbreaking Wave Containment
summary: You wrap enemies in four strands of water.

name: Unfolding Wind Crash
summary: You jump up to 120 feet in any direction and then deal 18d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures within a 20-foot emanation after you land, with a basic Reflex save.

name: Untwisting Iron Pillar
summary: You call upon the earth and your ki to shield you from your enemies.

name: Apex Companion
summary: Transform your animal companion into an apex form.

name: Fatal Aria
trait: Bard, Composition, Concentrate, Death, Emotion, Focus, Mental, Uncommon
summary: You perform music so perfect that the target may die of joy or sorrow.

name: Hero's Defiance
trait: Champion, Concentrate, Focus, Healing, Uncommon, Vitality
trigger: An attack would bring you to 0 Hit Points.
summary: You shout in defiance and are filled with a burst of healing.

name: Pied Piping
trait: Bard, Composition, Concentrate, Focus, Incapacitation, Mental, Sonic, Uncommon
summary: Your performance enraptures listeners, compelling them to follow you.

name: Song of the Fallen
target: up to 4 dead creatures or up to 4 undead creatures
summary: Rouse the dead or smite the undead.

name: Acidic Burst
summary: You create a shell of acid around yourself that immediately bursts outward.

name: Admonishing Ray
summary: A ray of energy bludgeons your target into submission without causing lasting harm.

name: Agitate
summary: You send the targets mind and body into overdrive, forcing it to become restless and hyperactive.

name: Air Bubble
trigger: A creature within range enters an environment where it can't breathe.
summary: React to create air for a creature to breathe.

name: Airburst
target: all creatures and unattended objects in the area
summary: A blast of wind wildly pushes everything nearby.

name: Alarm
summary: Be alerted if a creature enters a warded area.

name: Animal Allies
summary: Summon animals to briefly attack adjacent foes.

name: Animate Rope
target: up to 50 feet of rope or a nonliving rope-like object
