name: Ant Haul
deity: Aakriti, Balumbdar, Droskar, Dwarven Pantheon, Hearth and Harvest, Kurgess
summary: Target can carry more.

name: Anticipate Peril
deity: Alseta, Erecura, Grundinnar, Irez, Magdh, Shyka, The Freeing Flame, Urban Prosperity
summary: You grant the target brief foresight.

name: Aqueous Blast
duration: until the end of your turn
summary: You evoke a mass of water into the air around your outstretched fist.

name: Bane
summary: Weaken enemies' attacks in an aura around you.

name: Befuddle
summary: You sow seeds of confusion in your targets mind, causing their actions and thoughts to become clumsy.

name: Biting Words
summary: Hurl sonic taunts to hurt creatures.

name: Bless
summary: Strengthen allies' attacks in an aura around you.

name: Breadcrumbs
summary: Make a trail behind a creature.

name: Breathe Fire
deity: Angradd, Chohar, Lady Nanbyo, Moloch, Nurgal, Ra, Rovagug, Sarenrae, Szuriel, Walkena, Ymeri
summary: Release a small cone of flame from your mouth.

name: Briny Bolt
source: Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars pg. 80
summary: You hurl a bolt of saltwater from your extended hand.

name: Buffeting Winds
summary: You release a quick burst of wind that batters your living opponents without causing them lasting harm, while also blowing undead away.

name: Buoyant Bubbles
summary: Create bubbles that make a creature buoyant.

name: Camel Spit
summary: You alter your stomach, esophagus, and tongue to be able to spit partially digested food with force.

name: Carryall
summary: A floating platform follows you, carrying objects.

name: Celestial Accord
target: 2 creatures that each have an unfriendly or worse attitude toward the other
summary: You intervene in a heated disagreement between two creatures, encouraging them to put aside their differences and find some common ground.

name: Charm
trait: Concentrate, Emotion, Incapacitation, Manipulate, Mental, Subtle
deity: Ardad Lili, Asmodeus, Belial, Calistria, Conqueror Worm, Hathor, Nalinivati, Ravithra, Sturovenen, The Green Mother, Zura
summary: A creature becomes more friendly to you.

name: Chilling Spray
summary: Icy shards fly out from you in a cone.

name: Cleanse Cuisine
summary: Make food and drink safe and delicious.

name: Command
duration: until the end of the target's next turn
summary: Bid a creature approach, run, drop something, lie prone, or stand up.

name: Concordant Choir
summary: Damage foes with music.

name: Conductive Weapon
target: 1 metal weapon that is unattended or attended by a willing creature
summary: Charge a metal weapon with electricity.

name: Create Water
summary: Conjure 2 gallons of water.

name: Cycle of Retribution
source: Pathfinder #197: Let the Leaves Fall pg. 71
summary: An understanding of how violence begets more violence fills your target, causing it mental anguish

name: Dehydrate
summary: Make creatures parched, damaging and enfeebling them.

name: Detect Alignment
summary: See auras of a chosen alignment.

name: Detect Poison
summary: Determine whether an object or creature is poisonous or venomous.

name: Disguise Magic
summary: Mask the aura of a spell or item.

name: Dizzying Colors
summary: Swirling colors blind, dazzle, or stun creatures.

name: Draw Ire
summary: Mentally sting a creature's mind to make it less capable of attacking creatures other than you.

name: Dj Vu
summary: Make a creature do the same thing repeatedly.

name: Echoing Weapon
summary: Your attacks build up to release a sonic pulse.

name: Elysian Whimsy
summary: You overwhelm the target with an unexpected and unpredictable desire if it fails a Will save.

name: Endure
deity: Arazni, Arqueros, Fandarra, Folgrit, Narakaas, The Last Breath, Trudd
summary: You invigorate the touched creatures mind and urge it to press on.

name: Enfeeble
summary: Sap a creature's strength.

name: Exchange Image
summary: Trade appearances with the target.

name: Fashionista
summary: The target's clothes are transformed into ostentatious attire that epitomizes high-end local fashion.

name: Fated Healing
target: 2 creature who are hostile toward each other
source: Pathfinder #197: Let the Leaves Fall pg. 71
summary: You speak about the consequences of actions people take against each other

name: Fear
summary: Frighten a creature, possibly making it flee.

name: Flashy Disappearance
summary: You create a puff of colorful smoke that quickly disperses while you become temporarily invisible.

name: Fleet Step
deity: Baalzebul, Cayden Cailean, Chaldira, Lahkgya, The Laborer's Bastion, Uvuko, Yog-Sothoth
summary: Make your Speed much faster.

name: Flense

name: Floating Disk
summary: A disk of energy follows you, carrying objects.

name: Flourishing Flora
summary: Grow a patch of cacti, flowers, fruits, or roots to hurt your enemies.

name: Fold Metal
target: 1 unattended metallic object up to 5 Bulk
summary: Bend a metal object into a ball.

name: Foraging Friends
summary: Giving a cheerful whistle, you call forth a handful of small animals, such as birds or mice, to collect food for you and your allies.

name: Force Barrage
summary: Pelt creatures with unerring shards of magical force.

name: Forced Mercy
summary: You soften the target's blows, ensuring they avoid vital areas and cause no lasting harm.

name: Forge
summary: Developed before the introduction of the Iron Lagoon, this cantrip for superheating metal has also found valuable combat use.

name: Friendfetch
summary: You shoot out ephemeral, telekinetic strands that drag each target directly toward you, stopping in the closest unoccupied space to you in this path.

name: Gentle Landing
trigger: A creature within range is falling
summary: React to save a falling creature.

name: Glowing Trail
source: Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 79
summary: Your movements leave a vague glowing path behind you, like a misty echo of your presence.

name: Goblin Pox
summary: Infect a creature with goblin pox.

name: Gravitational Pull
summary: Pull one or more creatures towards you using gravity.

name: Grease
summary: Cover a target or an area with slippery grease.

name: Grim Tendrils
deity: Charon, Dajermube, Fumeiyoshi, Nhimbaloth, Nyarlathotep (Haunter in the Dark), Orcus, Treerazer
summary: Creatures in a line take void damage and start to bleed.

name: Gritty Wheeze
summary: You exhale desiccating grit and sand in a small cloud.

name: Gust of Wind
duration: until the start of your next turn
deity: Gozreh, Hei Feng, Hshurha, Pazuzu, Seafarer's Hope, Sky Keepers
summary: Wind blows out fires and knocks back objects and creatures.

name: Harm
target: 1 living creature or 1 willing undead creature

name: Heal
target: 1 willing living creature or 1 undead creature
summary: Vital energy heals the living or harms the undead, either a single creature or all in a burst.

name: Helpful Steps
summary: You call forth a ladder or staircase to help you reach greater heights.

name: Hippocampus Retreat
requirement: Youre mostly or totally submerged in water
summary: You temporarily shape your lower limbs into the tail of a hippocampus in order to swim away from a nearby foe after dealing a parting blow.

name: Horizon Thunder Sphere
summary: Gather energy and throw a ball of lightning.

name: Hydraulic Push
deity: Besmara, Dagon, Hanspur, Kelizandri, Lysianassa, Ragadahn, Sobek
summary: Damage and push a creature with a blast of water.

name: Ill Omen
deity: Ahriman, Azathoth, Gyronna, Imot, Lubaiko, Sifkesh, Zyphus
summary: Curse a creature with misfortune.

name: Illusory Disguise
deity: Hastur, Likha, Mahathallah, Nivi Rhombodazzle, Norgorber, Sivanah, The Lantern King
summary: Make yourself look like a different creature.

name: Illusory Object
summary: Form a convincing illusion of an object.

name: Imprint Message
summary: Put a false psychic imprint in an object.

name: Infuse Vitality
summary: Empower attacks with vital energy to damage the undead.

name: Inkshot
summary: A spray of viscous, toxic ink jets from your fingertip to strike a target creature in the face.

name: Instant Pottery
summary: Create earthenware objects.

name: Interposing Earth
trigger: You are the target of a Strike or would attempt a Reflex save against a damaging area effect
summary: React to make a barrier of earth.

name: Invisible Item
summary: Make an item disappear.

name: Item Facade
target: 1 object no more than 10 feet by 10 feet by 10 feet
summary: Disguise an item to look perfect or shoddy.

name: Jump
deity: Gogunta, Irori, Jin Li, Kabriri, Sun Wukong, The Divine Dare
summary: Make an impressive leap.

name: Juvenile Companion
summary: Turn your companion into its juvenile form.

name: Kinetic Ram
summary: Use waves of force to push enemies back
